General.Name: Metrodata Electronics Tbk
General.Description: PT Metrodata Electronics Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the information and communication technology (ICT) business in Indonesia. It operates through two divisions, Distribution and Solution and Consultation. The Distribution division sells hardware and software, and basic peripherals, such as data storage devices, terminals, memory, and peripherals. The Solution and Consultation division provides maintenance services; sells hardware, system management software, middleware, serverware, and system level software; offers professional services for consultation, implementation, and training; and sells software products. It also offers assembly services in the computer field or wireless communication equipment; system integration services; and software consultancy, as well as distributes information technology products and sells personal computer products. The company was founded in 1975 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.
